lines.text:
[the boys find out Principal Ott is Carl's old boss who had him turned in]
Ott the Snot! I mean, Principal Snot, I mean...

[to Ott]
They let you work with kids?
Who would ever suspect an elementary school principal?

[taking off Carl's fake women's eyelashes]
What'd you put these on with, airplane glue?
Ever see Nightmare on Elm Street?
We checked out the old Johnson place.
I told you kids to stay away from there, you could get hurt.
There were these two guys there, they looked like cops.
They are cops, not the kind you want to run into. They're the boss's guys, he keeps them around to minimize suspicion.
